general_advisory: September is the optimum time for nursery raising of tomato. Keep poultry farms clean to avoid bird diseases. Monitor and manage pests in crops accordingly.

advisory: Apply appropriate insecticides for Brown Plant Hopper and Bacterial Leaf Blight as per infestation levels.
Treat seeds to prevent Stem Rot disease and spray Validamycin or Captan + Hexaconazole fungicides as necessary.
Control Leaf webber and Sucking Pests using recommended pesticides. Apply Metiram for Wilt management.
Apply Neem-based pesticide for early stage pest control.
Spray neem-based pesticide or Chlorpyriphos for Epilachna Beetle management.
Use neem-based pesticide or insecticidal soap for Mealy bug control.
Maintain oxygen levels in the pond to avoid fish gulping. Consider aerators for aeration.
Circulate pond water using a pump to help with aeration.
